channel.title: CVE Feed for Unknown -- Advanced Search
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Unknown -- Advanced Search

item.title: CVE-2024-3265|2024-04-25T21:25:07.990Z -- Unknown -- Advanced Search
item.description: The Advanced Search WordPress plugin through 1.1.6 does not properly escape parameters appended to an SQL query, making it possible for users with the administrator role to conduct SQL Injection attacks in the context of a multisite WordPress configurations.

item.title: CVE-2024-2739|2024-04-15T05:00:05.507Z -- Unknown -- Advanced Search
item.description: The Advanced Search WordPress plugin through 1.1.6 does not have CSRF checks in some places, which could allow attackers to make logged in users perform unwanted actions via CSRF attacks
